DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a nutrition intervention during a rehabilitation stay followed by nutritional advice after discharge, can improve the nutritional status of the patients after 3 months.
DOC.brief_title: The Undernourished Patient: Prevention and Treatment
